SEARCH

All Classes and Interfaces

Class
Description
Applicant
Represents an Applicant in the system.
ApplicantBoundary
The ApplicantBoundary class provides the main interface for applicant interactions.
ApplicantController
Controller class for managing operations related to Applicant entities.
ApplicantRepository
Concrete implementation of Repository for managing Applicant entities.
ApplicationStatus
 
BoundaryStrings
Utility class that holds reusable ASCII banners and stylized strings for console display.
CsvUtils
Utility class for handling CSV-related formatting operations.
Enquiry
The Enquiry class represents an enquiry submitted by an applicant regarding a BTO project.
EnquiryController
The EnquiryController class handles logic for managing enquiries.
EnquiryRepository
The {EnquiryRepository class provides a singleton implementation for managing persistent storage and retrieval of Enquiry objects from a CSV file.
EnquiryStatus
 
IEntity
Generic interface representing an entity that can be stored and retrieved from a CSV file.
IUserProfile
Interface representing a user profile in the system.
LoginBoundary
Handles user interface and interaction for the login process.
LoginController
Handles user authentication logic for login functionality.
Main
 
Manager
Represents a Manager in the system, implementing both IEntity and IUserProfile interfaces.
ManagerBoundary
The ManagerBoundary class handles the manager's user interface interactions including profile updates, project management, application approvals, enquiry responses, and report generation.
ManagerController
The ManagerController class provides static methods for managing Manager entities.
ManagerRepository
The ManagerRepository class handles persistence and retrieval of Manager entities from a CSV file.
MaritalStatus
 
Officer
Represents an HDB Officer in the system.
OfficerBoundary
OfficerBoundary provides the UI interaction logic for an HDB Officer within the BTO system.
OfficerController
OfficerController handles the business logic and operations related to Officer users.
OfficerRepository
OfficerRepository is a singleton class that manages persistence for Officer entities.
PasswordHasher
Utility class for password hashing using the SHA-256 algorithm.
PrettyPrint
Utility class for formatting and printing detailed information about users and projects.
Project
Represents a BTO housing project with various room types, unit counts, pricing, application periods, and assigned officers.
ProjectApplication
Represents an application submitted by an applicant for a BTO project.
ProjectApplicationController
Controller class for managing project applications.
ProjectApplicationRepository
Repository class for managing ProjectApplication entities.
ProjectApplicationStatus
 
ProjectController
The ProjectController class provides methods to manage BTO projects in the system.
ProjectFilterContext
Encapsulates the filtering logic for Project listings in the system.
ProjectRegistration
Represents a project registration record where an officer registers to handle a BTO project.
ProjectRegistrationController
Controller class for handling logic related to officer registrations for BTO projects.
ProjectRegistrationRepository
Repository class for managing ProjectRegistration entities.
ProjectRepository
ProjectRepository handles the persistence and retrieval of Project entities from a CSV file.
Receipt
Represents a flat booking receipt in the HDB system.
ReceiptController
The ReceiptController class is responsible for generating booking receipts for successfully booked HDB applications.
RegistrationStatus
 
Reply
Represents a reply to an enquiry made by either an officer or a manager.
ReplyController
The ReplyController class manages the creation, retrieval, and display of replies to enquiries within the system.
ReplyRepository
The ReplyRepository class handles persistence and retrieval of Reply objects from a CSV data source.
ReportController
The ReportController class provides functionalities to generate filtered reports of booked project applications based on a manager's managed projects and a set of user-defined filtering criteria.
ReportCriteria
Represents a set of filtering criteria used for generating BTO project application reports.
ReportEntry
Represents a single entry in a BTO booking report.
ReportWriter
The ReportWriter class is responsible for generating and writing booking reports to a CSV file.
Repository<T>
Generic abstract repository class to manage storage, retrieval, and persistence of entities that implement the IEntity interface.
RepositoryGetter
Utility class for retrieving singleton instances of all repositories in the system.
Role
 
SafeScanner
Utility class for safe and validated input handling from the console.
SessionManager
The SessionManager class provides global flags that track session-related states.
User
Represents a user in the system with authentication credentials and a specific role.
UserBoundary
The UserBoundary class handles user-facing interactions related to general user operations, such as routing to role-specific menus and changing passwords.
UserController
The UserController class handles logic related to routing users to role-specific menu interfaces and updating user credentials such as passwords.
UsersRepository
Singleton repository class for managing User entities.
